info.name: Roblox - Improved
info.description: Roblox.com modified to something less... white. Includes tweaks I make to better my browsing experience.
info.additionalInfo: update: removed force sidebar option for now. Improved may be subjective, but I like it for the most part... It's not a complete overhaul, but it does tie together some of the old and new website together with a consistent gray background along with various other tweaks. I may have missed a few pages, so if something looks off just send me a message. In the future I may create a dark version for night browsing, but that could be a bit of an undertaking between styling everything and design choices. This is built off my other style Roblox Landing Contact: You can message me at MrgamesNwatch with suggestions or issues.
